metadata.title: Life Event Data Standard
metadata.description: Standardised data fields for describing an event that has occurred in a person's life.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Unique identifiers (IDs) associated with the event.

children.name: value
children.description: A single unique identifier attached to the event (e.g., ?).

children.name: system
children.description: System that the identifier adheres to (e.g., ?).

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Code for the type of the event (e.g. domestic violence incident).

fields.name: Risk
fields.description: Code for the risk level of the event (?).

fields.name: SubjectPerson
fields.description: References to Person(s) involved in the event.

children.name: ref
children.description: A reference to a Person record involved in the event.

children.name: involvement
children.description: Code for the nature of the Person's involvement in the event.

fields.name: RelatedProfessional
fields.description: References to Professional(s) involved in the event.

children.name: ref
children.description: A reference to a Professional record involved in the event.

children.name: involvement
children.description: Code for the nature of the Person's involvement in the event.

fields.name: RelatedService
fields.description: References to Service(s) involved in the event.

children.name: ref
children.description: A reference to a Service record involved in the event.

fields.name: TimeInformation
fields.description: Details about timing of the event

children.name: startDateTime
children.description: DateTime (ISO-8601) for start of the event.

children.name: endDateTime
children.description: DateTime (ISO-8601) for end of the event.

fields.name: LocationInformation
fields.description: Details about the location of the event
